PageInfo.Message:
As an Arisen, while spend your days, various
event notifications are sent to you through mail.
The content can be checked from the<COL
ffdc78>《Communication》, "Mail"</COL> section of
the "Game Menu" 【<KC UI_GAME_MENU>】.
<COL ffdc78>If an item is attached to the mail,
you can receive it from the section of the
"Character" menu labeled 《Item Post》</COL> in the
game menu【<KC UI_GAME_MENU>】.

Depending on the event, there may be a way to
receive items through <COL ffdc78>"Event Code
Input"</COL>.
If you have obtained an event code, try entering
it from the <KC UI_GAME_MENU>"Game Menu"<COL
ffdc78>"Online Shop"</COL> and see what happens.
Additionally, you can confirm the receipt of
items through the mail from the <COL ffdc78>"Item
Post"</COL>.
